title: Yrexi, God of Madness

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Drive a player insane each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - All effects of their abilities this night will be replaced by Unstoppable attacks; then, they will deal an Unstoppable attack to themself.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 895
*The wild god of insanity. His all-consuming descent is fated.*
Roleblock, redirect, detection, and conversion immune
